about_the_game:
The Dragon Army, commanded by the ruthless Drake Emperor Tiberius, marches ever closer to total conquest of the world. The once-mighty nations stand divided, each struggling in isolation as their lands fall one by one under the growing shadow of the army. Amid the chaos, a young man named Helio, from the humble village of Haven, faces his end in a vicious dragon attack. However, just as hope fades, a mysterious power awakens within him—the legendary "Skill Taker". Now, Helio must harness this ability to turn the tide of war, acquiring his enemies' strengths to fight back against an unstoppable force.

Engage in strategic, turn-based combat with a front-view command system that emphasizes exploiting enemy weaknesses in a fantasy RPG with beautiful pixel and anime-styled characters. As Helio, use the unique "Skill Taker" ability to steal and equip powerful skills from defeated foes, giving you the freedom to build and customize your arsenal. Master the art of anticipating enemy moves, unleashing devastating counterattacks, and outmaneuvering even the fiercest opponents. With each battle, you'll grow stronger and unlock new strategies, guiding Helio from a simple villager to a key player in the fight for the world's survival.

◆ Ability "Skill Taker"
An ability granted only to the protagonist, Helio, allowing him to acquire enemy skills.
Set the acquired skills freely and fight.

◆ Command Battles
Turn-based, front-view command battles.
Strike the enemy’s weaknesses precisely and gain the upper hand in battle.

◆ Advance on a path with no retreat!
An extreme battle where escape is not an option.
Gather precious equipment and items from treasure chests or enemy encounters, and fight with your own skills to the end.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and up
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This app features keyboard controls and partial controller support with the Xbox controller. Mouse/touch screen are not supported.
